long description: Local Idea to Idea Mobile Calls @10p/min
Local I2I @10p/min & Local Others Mobile Calls @30p/min

Unlimited ( Local +STD ) Idea to Idea Calls -- Subject to Non-Commercial usage: Commercial Usage as defined below. In case of Commercial Usage the Pack benefits would be withdrawn. Any of the below mentioned points would lead to removal of the offer. More than 500 Mins per day of Calling More than 100 Unique Numbers Dialed in a Week More Than 1200 Mins Per Week Of calling
Unlimited Local Idea to Idea Calls -- Fair Usage Policy applicable. FUP will mean any customer found Crossing 300 Mins/Calendar Day, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable

Unlimited local/STD calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.

Unlimited local/STD mobile calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable. -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.

Unlimited local/STD mobile calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable. -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
